title: Vampire Cop
description: Vampire detective Stoker Ramsey uses blood memory to solve crimes and these perps will learn the hard way… that crime sucks.
quote: Looks like their IPO wasn’t the only thing making a killing.
altHero: Stoker Ramsey with red eyes and exposed vampire teeth
alt1: Ramsey’s partner with a blue latex glove on, blood on her fingertip
alt2: Ramsey leans his head back as blood is dripped into his mouth
alt3: Ramsey walks down a foggy, dark alley
alt4: man lowers his gun in disbelief
